element1.content: What makes this app different from other such apps are its numerous features and many specialties.

element2.content: Easy to use, easy to scale. That's not all though. It is so much more than just the interface of a simple drawing program; it could do everything you'd expect in an image editing application (especially if they came with some support for landscape orientation).

element3.content: Icon packs A huge collection can be found within one menu bar without opening them again!

element4.content: There will always-be at least four icons available even wher
